title: A Kite story
creator_credit: Churchill Films and Pieter Van Deusen
brief_description: A story about a boy, two kites, and a stranger who makes the kites. He gives the boy a small white kite, to which he is very attached until he sees the glittering rocket kite…The tale is adventure and fantasy, and indicates the values of friendship and loyalty.
